name: Robotic Swarm - LTE 4G Simulation
tagline: Robotic Swarm simulation using Omnet++ and SimuLTE
body:
Simulated LTE network:

![Network](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aurbano/Swarm-SimuLTE/master/img/network.png)
> Network used, where the UE are the robots

###Data
After running the simulations several graphs can be plotted with the data, below are two samples:
![Delay](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aurbano/Swarm-SimuLTE/master/img/delay.png)

> Delay from a robot to the controller

![UDP packets](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aurbano/Swarm-SimuLTE/master/img/paquetesUDP.png)

> UPD traffic

###Developed by
 - Alejandro U. Álvarez
 - Nicolas Lozano Arguëlles
 - Pablo Álvarez González
 - Pedro López Mareque
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
